mutants.code:
def calculate_total_power(N, K, S):
    total_power = 1
    steps = N - K + 1
    for i in range(steps - 1):
        current_substring = S[i:i + K]
        next_substring = S[i + 1:i + 1 + K]
        power = sum((1 for (a, b) in zip(current_substring, next_substring) if a != b))
        total_power += power
    return total_power

def calculate_total_power(N, K, S):
    total_power = 0
    steps = N - K + 1
    for i in range(steps - 1):
        current_substring = S[i:i + K]
        next_substring = S[i + 1:i + -1 + K]
        power = sum((1 for (a, b) in zip(current_substring, next_substring) if a != b))
        total_power += power
    return total_power
